{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=WPS870G |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B0006AZ5AY;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/04/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=print server |fcc_id=ACQWPS870G, M4Y-XG-600 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model=MSP2007 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=AM29LV160DB |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16100-7T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-601 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3680 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Printer Port Controller;Attansic;AT7601F;;1; ,,, USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;μPD720101;NEC, JAPAN, D720101F1;1; |flags=print server |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=motorola |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Motorola 802.11g USB 2.0 Print Server''' :P/N: 512790-001-00 :GI: 512723-001-00
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=6614 Post regarding the device on the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :states the device is using a [[Brecis]] MSP2007, :[[NEC]] μPD720101 USB controller, :''AMD'' AM29LV160DB Flash (2MB)
The FCC operational description for this device :is a detailed [[SerComm]] datasheet for the device. *It states the device is using the following... :a [[Brecis]] MSP2007 SoC :1MB of Flash (HY29LV800TT-70) and 4MB of RAM (IS42S16100-7T) :a [[NEC]] μPD720101 USB 2.0 controller :a ''Davicom'' DM9161 FE PHY :an ''Attansic'' AT7601F printer port controller
